about_the_game:
Make your fantasies come true

Have you ever fantasized about watching two girls? This is a simulator video game for you to watch lesbians fucking each other, in your favourite positions, from any angle you want.

Customize them to your liking

You'll personalize their facial features, skin color, hairstyles, butts, breasts, and more, to match your wishes. Even illumination is customizable!

Choose their gender

To satisfy your desires, you'll be able to choose between 4 diferent genders:
- Female: the traditional woman with just a pussy.
- Futa A: a dick girl with pussy, no balls.
- Futa B: a dick girl with pussy and balls.
- Shemale: a dick girl with cuck and balls, but no pussy.

Unlock every possible combination

The more you play, the more content you'll have. To date you'll be able to unlock:
- +10 hairstyles
- +15 positions
- +25 accessories
Note that the content will keep increasing with updates.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains explicit uncensored sex between females and hermaphrodites (futanari), nudity and genitalia.

detailed_description:
Release announcement

Hi!
First of all, thanks to all that are already enjoying Lesbian Voyeur Simulator.
After releasing the game I've found some awful bugs, which lead me to make a quick fix and upload an update. To apologize, I've added a new accesory: sunglasses, you'll find them available for free on your customization panels.
During the next weeks I'll keep working on improving the game, making more unlockable content and fixing bugs. I estimate I'll be able to deliver you a new update on April 3rd (2020).

Thanks for reading!
